attributes.action: Hold an Immediate General Election to Restore Trust in Democracy
attributes.additional_details:
We call on His Majesty’s Government to hold an immediate general election. Trust has collapsed as citizens’ concerns are disregarded and freedoms threatened. 

Democracy requires accountability. When petitions with millions of signatures are disregarded and surveillance measures continue to expand without transparent debate, confidence in our democratic system is lost. 

A new mandate is urgently needed to restore accountability and safeguard liberty.
attributes.background: We are being consistently ignored, monitored and dismissed. Millions spoke out against digital ID, yet government presses ahead. The UK is sliding towards dictatorship. We demand an immediate general election to protect our freedom and our democracy. We have lost all trust.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
